dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: 가랑비에 옷 젖는 줄 모른다이/가 뭐예요?
dialogue.romanization: garangbie ot jeotneun jul moreundai/ga mwoyeyo?
dialogue.translation: What is "가랑비에 옷 젖는 줄 모른다"?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: 가랑비에 옷 젖는 줄 모른다은/는 little strokes fell great oaks(이)에요.
dialogue.romanization: garangbie ot jeotneun jul moreundaeun/neun little strokes fell great oaks(i)eyo.
dialogue.translation: "가랑비에 옷 젖는 줄 모른다" means "little strokes fell great oaks".
